reviews.review: With the introduction of SBMM, this game has gone straight downhlll for killers. Every match SWFs prove again they are the most OP thing in the game.  Survivor ques are insanely long.  Maps are way too large.  Hold W meta is still going on because of the maps leading to extremely boring matches.  Keys are still a thing for something.  Nothing is being done about this by the developers.  So for anyone interested in the killer side of this game I recommend staying in lower ranks where matches are fair and fun. Better yet, just don't play this at all unless you are in a SWF, in which case it's a free win.  It's apparent survivor mains enjoy free wins and bully matches with how much the game is in their favor.  I'm in no mood to play only the strongest killers in the game in full sweat mode just to win or have fun.

Honestly a great game compared to Friday The 13th!

It's much more expandable with content added quite frequently if you ask me, the game remains fresh in terms of that. 
It also flows quite well when playing it, yes it does have it's issues wit the hitboxes and stuff sometimes lag too can cause issues but majority of the time the gameplay is fun for me and I've been enjoying it quite more recently. 

Another thing to add that I wish this game did was make more skins and maybe bump down the pricing of a few especially recolours they don't have to be that expensive if you're buying with Auric Cells or even the Shards ingame you earn by leveling up. 

But other then that, this is more of a positive review that I have for this game!

Just to put this out there, I have previously played 706 hours on ps4 and 345 hours on microsoft store (game pass)
Pros:
- extremely addicting gameplay
- Great game design with looping and mind games
- Good killer variety
- Licenses
Cons:
- Terrible balancing
- Incompetent developers
- Painful grinding
- Terrible skill based matchmaking
- God awful graphics
- Game is barely functional 
- No survivor variety
- Cosmetics are too expensive or are only buy able via auric cells
 - Updates only focused on the look of the game instead of fixing the game (Game still looks terrible)
- Game is a bug fest 
- Terrible/extremely toxic community
- Game allows mechanics to remove any sort of fun via face camping, tunneling, gen rushing, meta/broken builds etc.
- Only 1 game mode
- Barely any innovation for the past years since the game's release
I'm only playing this game because it's different and a literal addiction

Pay to Win - over 50% of the non cosmetic content is only available via cash
Linear Gameplay, Small if any skill cap - If you've played it more than once, you can say you've played it a million times, because nothing going to change. You either repair gens, or "kill" survivors 3 times before they actually die. 

3 words or less:
Mundane.
Skillless
Waste of time and money.
I hate this game and all the overpowered killer perks but my god is it fun to play with friends. Not fun when playing alone.

After more time they went from bad to worse. The worst aspect of playing survivor has been amplified and empowered even further. As survivor you have a "3 strikes you are out" system, but killers can cheese that by camping or tunneling you to make it more like 1.5 strikes you are out. This was a frequently complained about design flaw, and in the patch designed to curb those actions the developers buffed them instead. Not only that, but they also nerfed some of the countermeasures to those that you could load up with prior to the match starting. 
To add salt on the wound the hotfix patch just implemented today nerfed a weak but fun perk, brought back an unfun combo that was removed in the prior patch, and nerfed a perk for everyone other than the 2 problem case killers that could abuse it. This, mind you, is after a dev statement that "we will not make kneejerk reactions". 2 of these fixes are due to bugs/unintended interactions that they refused to fix. Mettle of Man had a bug preventing it from working due to the endurance nerfs across the board, and Merciless Storm had its intended 9 second effect extended in extremely niche circumstances. What was the solution? Practically delete Mettle of Man from the game, and bring back an overly punishing combo instead of fix those bugs.
Numerous people have posted or made videos of the various problems and solutions to the game design flaws, but the devs are so arrogant to believe no one else can be correct. To make it even worse they balance around the statistics rather than the actual mechanical problems. They ignore how people are killed, and just count the deaths. If someone uses the in-game suicide feature because they don't like playing against a particular player/killer/perk/etc. the devs don't know that the player quit when the match first started, and even worse matches with DCs do not count toward statistics. If someone hates something so much they will soak a scaling DC penalty starting at 5 minutes, then it is clear something in that match was wrong or bad. In rare cases people may have to deal with real life issues, but when a spike of DCs/early suicides occur it is clear there is something fundamentally wrong.

this game seems to get worse with every subsequent patch. Their match making is perpetually broken despite multiple reworks. Killers with essay long power descriptions and overpowered abilities. Gen rush when you chase someone for 10 seconds, tunneled and slugged at 5 gens. Don't waste your time, buy something else before you fall down the rabbit hole that is this abusive relationship of a game.

i want to like this game so much but i cant because playing as the killer is the worst experience unless your playing against new survivors. the concept this game is supposed to achieve is a multiplayer horror game where you can play as a killer yet the game play is the exact opposite due to trash balancing. a good team of survivors will roll a killer every single time especially the vanilla killers.
 the game by default doesnt have game chat but that can be easily exploited with  discord giving the survivors an advantage their not supposed to have . even high level killers get bullied by 4 survivors will 4 purple perks and 4 flash lights, if you pick up a survivor theyll just call their friend on discord to flash light you or just disable the hook your walking up to  or all of them can ljust simply block your path so that you drop them, there is nothing you can do about it and no way to counter these play styles.  i suggest giving the killer more perk slots since 4 perks against 16 perks is bad game design, and you might as well give the vanilla killers one more ability since most of the licence characters have 2 abilities or an additional game mechanic. 

also they might as well make the game ftp since they are charging ftp prices on all the cosmetics, i dont understand how character skins are 12 dollars but the dlc characters themselves are 5 dollars. the only reason this game has the tiny  player base it has  is because friday the 13th was taken down and last year never really blew up, but be ready to wait 5 minutes between each match because nobody wants to play killer 

 Until this game decides to make the game better instead of spending all there money on new licenced characrers its gonna be a 3/10 for me, it can be fun at times but its flaws are too noticable to give a lot of time to
